name: DecreasedSystolicBloodPressureBelowKnownBaseline
title: Decreased systolic blood pressure below known baseline
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents decreased systolic blood pressure below known baseline.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify decreased systolic blood pressure below know baseline in patients with severe sepsis or septic shock. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Physical Exam, Finding data type.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include SNOMEDCT codes that identify the finding decreased systolic arterial pressure.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)
